page.title: 09A Visit to the Town Hall
page.content: When we went to the town hall,the first thing we did was ask questions to the {Chief Executive Officer.}He said that there are 38 councillors on the Borough Council and that there were 14 wards where elections took place.He also said that to become an officer you have to have a few years in the council and pass a few exams.The first council meeting was held in 1894.We then went to an {Environmental Health Committee } meeting.They discussed vandalised bus shelters,but there is no money left to repair them this year. The Lady Mayoress then took us to another room where we had crisps and biscuits.
